title: So, Spike Spencer is the voice of Kled.

embed.description: League Of Legends: Kled Charges Into Battle (That's meeeeeeee!!!!) http://ow.ly/rUzQ503iieU

body:
It has been teased before that Kled VA voiced someone in League before, now we know it's the guy who voiced Wukong.

Ha, it's like Shinji Ikari just released all his anger into one character.

replies.body:
(Cut and pasted from another post)

Now that's Spike has chosen to reveal himself, i can speak on it. He did amazing work, nailing so many takes so fast.
We split the records to three days to try and save his voice-- but each day he was willing to push it further than was rational. A total pro, he was quick to adjust to notes, totally in control of his instrument, and easy to work with. Hopefully, we can get him in to rework wukong someday (#notmyteamthough)

Small topic hijack, but have you guys ever done work with Michelle Ruff? She is simply an awesome VA.

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michelle_Ruff

Probably her most famous VA role to date is as Rukia Kuchiki from Bleach. Either that or Etna from Disgaea.
